string.text: I want to fight. Whom do you have this time?
Now there is noone to fight with. Come again later when we have a new batch of mutants from Duty.
Now you have to give money for participation. 1000 roubles.
Here your 1000 roubles
I don't have any money.
Darn it, another beggar here.
You owe me 2000 roubles for the participation.
Here's 2000 roubles.
I have no money.
And where do these tramps come from in the Zone?
Pay 3000 roubles for participation and the bloodsucker is ready.
Here's your money.
I don't have such a sum.
Damn, even my little son has such money.
Not so fast. First pay 5000 roubles for the participation.
Here's the money.
I have no money.
Don't try pretending a beggar.
If agree, then pay 5000 for participation.
Here, your 5000 roubles.
I don't have money.
Even stalkers can be tramps too. I can't recognize this world.
There's a pseudodog. A large specie, but quite beaten up. On the other hand, a very fierce one, same as my mother-in-law. I'm blessed to have never seen her.
Deal. One more thing. Put the stake on time you kill the monster within. If you do it - you win, otherwise - you lose. The less the time chosen, the bigger is the money won.
30 seconds, tripple win.
One and a half minute, double win.
Without time limit. A half-stake win.
I changed my mind.
Pooh, milksop. I will not return your money anyway.
I will try. Let your dog out.
No, I will not fight against the dog.
Our girl is afraid of doggie. Well, don't be upset.
There is a freak in gas-mask. Called Snork. Thin and feeble-looking, but quite agile, no worse than Jackie Chan. I saw a couple of his flicks when a child.
The official part is over. Welcome to the lounge.
Bring on your snork.
No, don't want to fight the snork.
Got scared to be dishonoured by a half-rotten gas-masked freak?
This time we've got true luck. We caught a young bloodsucker. Still dumb, but already with all the bad manners inherited as proper.
Go ahead, get the bloodsucker ready.
No, don't want fighting against the bloodsucker.
Aha! Got scared. This is what I was suspecting.
This time we've got a little midget in black cloack - burer.
Bring this one out.
No, don't want fighting against the burer.
He's hardly reaching your weist in height. And this one made you scared?
It's a special day we have. Don't know where they caught him, but it's a true beast. And this is the way they call him - Beast.
Deal. Give me the Beast.
No, Beast is too much.
Well, frankly this beast is spooky even for me. But I never go to fight on arena as well, so who's being coward here?\n
Got a couple of questions.
Shoot.
No more questions here.
What's the establishment?

This is my business in the area here. Arena is a place where any stalker will be able to test his forces in a duel with mutants. And if the stalker is skillful enough - he can earn some money as well. Excitement is something even stalkers possess. About a year and a half ago I was cleansing a nest of bloodsuckers with a friend of mine. We ran the last one, a full-grown one into a house, got all the exits blocked, then sat down waiting. And then my friend utters - I bet I do him in within 2 minutes. He entered the dwelling and did him in. That was the moment when the idea originated. We made a deal with the Duty, grabbed a hangar to make an arena out of it. Now we have our own business in the Zone.
How do live mutants appear here?

We made a deal with the Duty. Previously they killed everyone when cleansing, but later I proposed them money in exchange for injured weakened mutants. We reached agreement fast. From that moment on I have a virtually never-ending source of live mutants. Later I get the bodies stuffed to sell beyond the zone limits. They are extremely popular.
Where are you from?

Where from? From many places. I don't even know what to consider my homeland. A long time I spent in Africa, then several years in Ecuador. And then I heard about this cute place and understood that I can earn a good penny here.
What are the rules?

Oh, the rules are pretty simple. I invented them myself. There's a cage, and a mutant is let inside the cage. You pay money, so as choose a time you need to kill the monster. If you make it - you get the win. If you don't cope with it - I keep the money. Should you die - I oblige to bury you with all the ceremonies as proper. The less is the time you choose, the bigger is the win.
Hi there! I've got a new pet. Wanna try your forces against it?
So, what are you waiting for? Get into the cage, come on.
Sorry, there's noone to fight against yet. Wait for a day or two until we can catch a new mutant.
There you are! Well done! Get your win. If you desire another fight for money - drop in.
Sorry, bro, but you lose. Come again next time if you want.
Oh, hello. What's up?
What do you need, stalker?.
You here to buy some shit?
Hey guy, how goes the Zone? So...I hope you have repair work that needs done...Heh, I need some cash bad.
